Inside the Ark.

Quckstride steps in readilly, and cracks his knuckles.

"I=
 think I can lend my services here sir.  I've worked with the control box b=
efore and about this bomb, I haven't defused one in a long time but I do kn=
ow how to. It's a good thing I paid attention in the technological training=
 sessions."

He climbs up to the control box, and gently opens the door, vi=
a a manual button on the side.  He looks at the inner workings and assesses=
 what needs to be done.  

"Oh boy..  Okaaay, well, here's what I think guy=
s..  The wiring appears to have been altered somewhat, which means whoever =
our intruder is, is rather skilled in this field.  But, it doesn't mean it =
can't falter.  I overheard Tucson talking about trying to disrupt this with=
 a sonar wave, and truthfully, I think it's our best shot. After that, I ca=
n get to the bomb and stop it from going off."

Uproar nodds.

Well, there =
ya have it Leo ll.  It's up ta the boss ta step in first.  I hope he's clos=
e."

Outside the Ark, Tucson now finds himself within range to execute the =
sonar disruption plan.  He begins to transmit while enroute.

"All right, T=
ucson to Rodimus, and Legacy.  I am within range and transmitting now.  You=
 should begin to see a disruption in the Ark's systems in the form of stati=
c and audio interference.  Once you see that, it's time to move in and quic=
kly regain control of the mainframe.   This should also bring our enemy out=
 of hiding, once realizing what is happening. It will be your opportunity t=
o seize and immobilize him."

Rat Trap senses the wave.

"Owww, Wheels, is =
it supposed ta hurt our ears?"

Tucson sighs.

I'm sorry Rat Trap, I know, =
I did not have time to configure a saftey buffer for the transmission.  I a=
ppologize for any pain any of you feel, and now suggest that all of you tur=
n off your audio sensors now.  That goes for you as well, Rodimus, Legacy, =
everyone.  This transmission is going to cause more than just a mild disrup=
tion, it may also cause you moderate to severe discomfort.

The sonar wave =
gains in strength, as Rat Trap does as told.  The ground beneath them begin=
s to vibrate with the transmission yet, Tucson seems to continue driving ov=
er it at a steady speed.

Night Shift steadies himself on the shakey ground=
 beneath his tires.

"Woahh, that's some heavy sonar you're puttn' out big =
guy..  Let's hope this works."

Tucson knew he would have to amplify the wa=
ve.  He now activates his built in amplifiers to do so.

" Get ready, I'm a=
mplifying the transmission."

Upon doing that, the ground vibrates just a t=
ad more.  Pebbles dance in all directions as Tucson comes closer and closer=
 to the Ark.
